reviewText: Purchased as gift and the recipient liked Deacon Alex Jones very much!!!  One of the Greatest conversion story ever told by a former pastor of two churches.  Check it out!!!

This was an unexpected and inspiring transformation of a person's life that affected everyone around him and everything he did from that point forward.  I highly recommend this product to anyone interested in knowing more about the Catholic faith, who's not into discrediting a faith based on ignorant prejudice or what we've heard from others.

This video was informative, inspirational and it very much touched my heart.  It is easy to understand and very thought provoking.  Deacon Jones makes you think of the importance of your faith, why you practice that faith and why you should continue to pursue the Word of God.  He helps you to realize that it is o.k. to practice a faith that is often misunderstood.  I have peace and motivation after watching his story.  He is such a great speaker!  I want that fire that Deacon Jones has.
